Articles.Content:
This is based on the experimental Soviet rotor craft from 1959 to 1964. This thing is very tricky to fly, so you may have to alternate on the throttle to control the pitch. I also placed some RCS thrusters to help control it while hovering (but not guaranteed to do that when you're trying to land...). When taking off, start the main rotors first, then activate the propeller engines.

Approaching the island runway.

Looming over the runway. Unfortunately, the craft became unstable when trying to land and crashed... its real life counterparts crashed in a similar manner, but were from turns or rolls...

Mod used: Firespitter
